comments.body: What. This is beyond overkill. You do NOT need a 5060 for aiml unless you're building an LLM or you're using it to train heavy  amounts of data. Also don't worry about the hackathons, no one's laptop will ever last a whole hackathon. Get charger that's all. I personally prefer thin laptops but your choice.
Nobody is going to be training any models locally lmao.

I had a gaming laptop when I was in my undergrad. You’re definitely not buying this for “college stuff”. The dude who recommended you to go for a lighter laptop is right.

You won’t be training any models locally. None of us do.

Now, if you want to play games and stuff, sure. But carrying it around will be a pain.

And if you have money to burn, I’d recommend getting a Thinkpad and installing Linux with your favorite distro on it
